channel.title: Cool Stars 19
channel.description: The latest news of Cool Stars 19

item.title: Request for financial support
item.description: Registration will be open soon. Meanwhile, we are accepting requests for financial support. You can find the conditions and the form on the registration webpage.

item.title: The CS19 hackaton is announced
item.description: The CS 19 hackaton is officially announced and registration is now open to 50 first participants. Visit the hack day webpage for more information.
